Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,109 @@ +import { Sparkles, Smile, Scissors, Heart, AlignHorizontalJustifyCenter, Activity, ShieldCheck, Zap } from "lucide-react"; +// import cosmeticDentistry from "@/assets/cosmetic-dentistry.jpg"; +// import veneers from "@/assets/veneers.jpg"; +// import whitening from "@/assets/whitening.jpg"; +// import implants from "@/assets/implants.jpg"; +// import smileMakeover from "@/assets/smile-makeover.jpg"; +// import invisalign from "@/assets/invisalign.jpg"; +// import gumContouring from "@/assets/gum-contouring.jpg"; +// import rootCanal from "@/assets/root-canal.jpg"; + +const services = [ + { + icon: Sparkles, + title: "Cosmetic Dentistry", + description: "Comprehensive aesthetic treatments to enhance your smile's appearance and boost your confidence.", + // image: cosmeticDentistry, + }, + { + icon: Smile, + title: "Veneers", + description: "Custom porcelain veneers that create a perfectly aligned, bright, and beautiful smile.", + // image: veneers, + }, + { + icon: Zap, + title: "Teeth Whitening", + description: "Professional whitening treatments that brighten your smile up to 8 shades in just one visit.", + // image: whitening, + }, + { + icon: ShieldCheck, + title: "Dental Implants", + description: "Permanent tooth replacement solutions that look, feel, and function like natural teeth.", + image: implants, + }, + { + icon: Heart, + title: "Smile Makeover", + description: "Complete smile transformation combining multiple treatments for stunning results.", + image: smileMakeover, + }, + { + icon: AlignHorizontalJustifyCenter, + title: "Invisalign / Braces", + description: "Clear aligners and traditional braces to straighten teeth discreetly and effectively.", + image: invisalign, + }, + { + icon: Scissors, + title: "Gum Contouring", + description: "Laser gum reshaping to create a balanced, aesthetically pleasing smile line.", + image: gumContouring, + }, + { + icon: Activity, + title: "Root Canal", + description: "Pain-free root canal treatments to save damaged teeth and restore oral health.", + image: rootCanal, + }, +]; + +const Services = () => { + return ( +
+
+
+

+ Our Services +

+

+ Comprehensive dental solutions tailored to your unique needs +

+
+ +
+ {services.map((service, index) => ( +
+
+ +
+
+
+
+ +
+

+ {service.title} +

+

+ {service.description} +

+
+
+ ))} +
+
+
+ ); +}; + +export default Services;
